epyr.constants

Created on Tue May 6 09:52:16 2025

@author: sylvainbertaina

Module Attributes

SPEED_OF_LIGHT_SI

VACUUM_PERMEABILITY_SI

(μ₀) Magnetic constant / Vacuum permeability (SI).

VACUUM_PERMITTIVITY_SI

(ε₀) Electric constant / Vacuum permittivity (SI).

PLANCK_CONSTANT_SI

REDUCED_PLANCK_CONSTANT_SI

(ħ) Reduced Planck constant (h-bar = h/2π) (SI).

ELEMENTARY_CHARGE_SI

ELECTRON_MASS_SI

(mₑ) Electron mass (SI).

PROTON_MASS_SI

(mₚ) Proton mass (SI).

FINE_STRUCTURE_CONSTANT

(α) Fine-structure constant (dimensionless).

SPEED_OF_LIGHT_CGS

PLANCK_CONSTANT_CGS

REDUCED_PLANCK_CONSTANT_CGS

(ħ) Reduced Planck constant (h-bar) (CGS).

ELEMENTARY_CHARGE_CGS

ELECTRON_MASS_CGS

(mₑ) Electron mass (CGS).

PROTON_MASS_CGS

(mₚ) Proton mass (CGS).

BOHR_MAGNETON_SI

(μ<0xE2><0x82><0x8B>) Bohr magneton (SI).

BOHR_MAGNETON_CGS

(μ<0xE2><0x82><0x8B>) Bohr magneton (CGS).

NUCLEAR_MAGNETON_SI

(μ<0xE2><0x82><0x99>) Nuclear magneton (SI).

NUCLEAR_MAGNETON_CGS

(μ<0xE2><0x82><0x99>) Nuclear magneton (CGS).

ELECTRON_G_FACTOR

(gₑ) Electron g-factor (free electron) (Dimensionless).

PROTON_G_FACTOR

(gₚ) Proton g-factor (Dimensionless).

ELECTRON_GYROMAGNETIC_RATIO_SI

(γₑ) Electron gyromagnetic ratio (SI).

ELECTRON_GYROMAGNETIC_RATIO_MHZ_T_SI

(|γₑ|/2π) Electron gyromagnetic ratio magnitude in MHz/T (SI).

ELECTRON_GYROMAGNETIC_RATIO_CGS

(γₑ) Electron gyromagnetic ratio (CGS).

PROTON_GYROMAGNETIC_RATIO_SI

(γₚ) Proton gyromagnetic ratio (SI).

PROTON_GYROMAGNETIC_RATIO_MHZ_T_SI

(|γₚ|/2π) Proton gyromagnetic ratio magnitude in MHz/T (SI).

PROTON_GYROMAGNETIC_RATIO_CGS

(γₚ) Proton gyromagnetic ratio (CGS).
epyr.constants.SPEED_OF_LIGHT_SI = 299792458.0

  1. Speed of light in vacuum (SI). Exact.

epyr.constants.VACUUM_PERMEABILITY_SI = 1.25663706212e-06

(μ₀) Magnetic constant / Vacuum permeability (SI). CODATA 2018.

epyr.constants.VACUUM_PERMITTIVITY_SI = 8.8541878128e-12

(ε₀) Electric constant / Vacuum permittivity (SI). CODATA 2018. Calculated from μ₀ and c.

epyr.constants.PLANCK_CONSTANT_SI = 6.62607015e-34

  1. Planck constant (SI). Exact.

epyr.constants.REDUCED_PLANCK_CONSTANT_SI = 1.0545718176461565e-34

(ħ) Reduced Planck constant (h-bar = h/2π) (SI).

epyr.constants.ELEMENTARY_CHARGE_SI = 1.602176634e-19

  1. Elementary charge (magnitude) (SI). Exact.

epyr.constants.ELECTRON_MASS_SI = 9.1093837015e-31

(mₑ) Electron mass (SI). CODATA 2018.

epyr.constants.PROTON_MASS_SI = 1.67262192369e-27

(mₚ) Proton mass (SI). CODATA 2018.

epyr.constants.FINE_STRUCTURE_CONSTANT = 0.0072973525693

(α) Fine-structure constant (dimensionless). CODATA 2018. Same in SI & CGS.

epyr.constants.BOHR_MAGNETON_SI = 9.2740100783e-24

(μ<0xE2><0x82><0x8B>) Bohr magneton (SI). μ<0xE2><0x82><0x8B> = eħ / (2mₑ).

epyr.constants.NUCLEAR_MAGNETON_SI = 5.0507837461e-27

(μ<0xE2><0x82><0x99>) Nuclear magneton (SI). μ<0xE2><0x82><0x99> = eħ / (2mₚ).

epyr.constants.ELECTRON_G_FACTOR = -2.00231930436256

(gₑ) Electron g-factor (free electron) (Dimensionless). CODATA 2018. Negative sign indicates moment opposes spin angular momentum.

epyr.constants.PROTON_G_FACTOR = 5.5856946893

(gₚ) Proton g-factor (Dimensionless). CODATA 2018.

epyr.constants.ELECTRON_GYROMAGNETIC_RATIO_SI = -176085963022.23312

(γₑ) Electron gyromagnetic ratio (SI). γₑ = gₑ μ<0xE2><0x82><0x8B> / ħ. Approx -1.7608 × 10¹¹ rad⋅s⁻¹⋅T⁻¹.

epyr.constants.ELECTRON_GYROMAGNETIC_RATIO_MHZ_T_SI = 28024.951424085102

(|γₑ|/2π) Electron gyromagnetic ratio magnitude in MHz/T (SI). Approx 28024.95 MHz/T.

epyr.constants.PROTON_GYROMAGNETIC_RATIO_SI = 267522187.44441766

(γₚ) Proton gyromagnetic ratio (SI). γₚ = gₚ μ<0xE2><0x82><0x99> / ħ. Approx 2.6752 × 10⁸ rad⋅s⁻¹⋅T⁻¹.

epyr.constants.PROTON_GYROMAGNETIC_RATIO_MHZ_T_SI = 42.57747851853565

(|γₚ|/2π) Proton gyromagnetic ratio magnitude in MHz/T (SI). Approx 42.577 MHz/T.

epyr.constants.SPEED_OF_LIGHT_CGS = 29979245800.0

  1. Speed of light in vacuum (CGS).

epyr.constants.PLANCK_CONSTANT_CGS = 6.62607015e-27

  1. Planck constant (CGS).

epyr.constants.REDUCED_PLANCK_CONSTANT_CGS = 1.0545718176461565e-27

(ħ) Reduced Planck constant (h-bar) (CGS).

epyr.constants.ELEMENTARY_CHARGE_CGS = 4.803204712570263e-10

  1. Elementary charge (magnitude) (CGS).

epyr.constants.ELECTRON_MASS_CGS = 9.1093837015e-28

(mₑ) Electron mass (CGS).

epyr.constants.PROTON_MASS_CGS = 1.67262192369e-24

(mₚ) Proton mass (CGS).

epyr.constants.BOHR_MAGNETON_CGS = 9.2740100783e-21

(μ<0xE2><0x82><0x8B>) Bohr magneton (CGS).

epyr.constants.NUCLEAR_MAGNETON_CGS = 5.0507837461000006e-24

(μ<0xE2><0x82><0x99>) Nuclear magneton (CGS).

epyr.constants.ELECTRON_GYROMAGNETIC_RATIO_CGS = -1760859630222331.2

(γₑ) Electron gyromagnetic ratio (CGS). Approx -1.7608 × 10⁷ rad⋅s⁻¹⋅G⁻¹.

epyr.constants.PROTON_GYROMAGNETIC_RATIO_CGS = 2675221874444.177

(γₚ) Proton gyromagnetic ratio (CGS). Approx 2.6752 × 10⁴ rad⋅s⁻¹⋅G⁻¹.
